name: Out of the Connection
description:
A hacker has hacked into the connection with his top of the line tool called "The Axe". His goal is the steal user data but thankfully, the security people expected this and gave the user data a protection algorithm to avoid leaks in the form of a squishy blue ball.

It's your job to guide that algorithm and get him to the other side of the connection safely.

Press R to restart

made in collaboration with a friend

made for the Godot wild jam with the theme connection and has all three wild cards

the particle effects don't show up on the HTML one and I don't know why.

music: Coda - Tires on Fire
